titles.title: Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to promote public awareness of, and increased research relating to, Chrohn's Disease.
Expressing the sense of the Congress that a commemorative postage stamp should be issued to promote public awareness of, and increased research relating to, Chrohn's Disease.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform.

bill.summary: Calls on: (1) the U.S. Postal Service to issue a commemorative postage stamp to promote public awareness of, and increased research relating to, Chrohn's Disease; and (2) the Citizen's Stamp Advisory Committee of the U.S. Postal Service to recommend to the Postmaster General that such a stamp be issued.
